page.title: 20Changes in Woodlesford
page.content: One of our most famous local people is Alf Roberts. He is now 77 years old but still fit and healthy. He was M.P. for our area for 32 years until he retired in 1983. He told us about how Woodlesford and Oulton had changed since he was a child. The biggest difference was that at that time he said that Woodlesford was a very lonely place mainly surrounded by woods and fields. Now most of our area is covered with houses and it is hard to see where Woodlesford and Oulton begin or end. The people who lived in Woodlesford were very poor. Mr. Roberts worked in the quarries and the pits, but none of these jobs are left now. He said school was very strict and if you did not work hard enough you would stay in the baby class.
